name: Jennifer Waste
review: I wanted to buy a car from the Auto Plus. The experience in the salon was suber the salesman Ash, was very helpful and patient. He in detail explained everything and answered every question I had.Overall I had a great time and driven off in a car of my dreams.

name: Jeff Frost
review: This was the first time I've put a deposit on a car without seeing it and I am very cautious and fussy and being a salesman myself not in to car sales tactics from dealerships, nor do I leave reviews, so this is a first for me. I was sent a walk around video and any information on the history that I required, and I was collected at the train station after a 3.5 hour train ride.

name: Henry Dark
review: Very polite, very patient and not pushy at all and a very respectful person who doesn't give you all the salesman drama and treats you like a person. Customer service was first class, and I recommend carco.uk and especially Amir to anyone looking to buy a good car from a good used car dealership. Well worth the long travel their and back and would use them again.

name: John Stone
review: Abdul made the whole process of buying a new car very simple. From start to finish he thoroughly explained every element and made it easy to understand the jargon. I would not hesitate to recommend and to purchase another car through him.
